san-lo-mvu109:7: bhagavāṁ uruvilvākāśyapasya āśramāto mahatā bhikṣusaṁghena sārdhaṁ ardhatrayodaśabhir bhikṣuśatair maharṣiṇām āśramapadaṁ dharmāraṇyaṁ gato || tahiṁ dāni sapta jaṭilaśatāni prativasanti sarvāṇi caturdhyānalābhīni paṁcābhijñāni saviṁśaśatavarṣikāni jātīye sarvāṇi ca paripakvakuśalamūlāni caramabhavikāni | bhagavān teṣāṁ anugrahārthaṁ tahiṁ āśramapadaṁ gato | teṣāṁ bhagavāṁ jaṭilānāṁ dharmapadeṣu sahasravargaṁ bhāṣati ||
san-lo-mvu109:10: ekā arthavatī śreyā yāṁ śrutvā upaśāmyati ||
san-lo-mvu109:12: ekā arthavatī śreyā yāṁ śrutvā upaśāmyati ||
san-lo-mvu109:13: yo śatāni sahasrāṇāṁ saṁgrāme manujā jaye |
san-lo-mvu109:14: yo caikaṁ jaye ātmānaṁ sa vai saṁgrāmajit* varaḥ ||
san-lo-mvu109:15: yo jayeta sahasrāṇāṁ māse māse śataṁ śataṁ |
san-lo-mvu109:16: na so buddhe prasādasya kalām arghati ṣoḍaśīṁ ||
san-lo-mvu109:17: yo jayeta sahasrāṇāṁ māse māse śataṁ śataṁ |
san-lo-mvu109:18: na so dharme prasādasya kalām arghati ṣoḍaśīṁ ||
san-lo-mvu109:19: yo jayeta sahasrāṇāṁ māse māse śataṁ śataṁ |
san-lo-mvu109:20: na so saṁghe prasādasya kalām arghati ṣoḍaśīṁ ||
san-lo-mvu109:21: yo jayeta sahasrāṇāṁ māse māse śataṁ śataṁ |
san-lo-mvu109:22: so va saṁpannaśīlānāṁ kalāṁ nārghati ṣoḍaśīṁ ||
san-lo-mvu109:23: yo jayeta sahasrāṇāṁ māse māse śataṁ śataṁ |
san-lo-mvu109:24: na so svākhyātadharmāṇāṁ kalām arghati ṣoḍaśīṁ ||
san-lo-mvu109:25: māse māse kuśāgreṇa bālo bhuṁjeya bhojanaṁ |
san-lo-mvu109:26: na so buddhe prasādasya kalām arghati ṣoḍaśīṁ ||
san-lo-mvu109:27: māse māse kuśāgreṇa bālo bhuṁjeya bhojanaṁ |
san-lo-mvu109:28: na so dharme prasādasya kalām arghati ṣoḍaśīṁ ||
san-lo-mvu109:29: māse māse kuśāgreṇa bālo bhuṁjeya bhojanaṁ |
san-lo-mvu109:30: na so saṁghe prasādasya kalām arghati ṣoḍaśīṁ ||
san-lo-mvu109:31: māse māse kuśāgreṇa bālo bhūmjeya bhojanaṁ |
san-lo-mvu109:32: na so dhyānaprasādānāṁ kalām arghati ṣoḍaśīṁ ||
san-lo-mvu109:33: māse māse kuśāgreṇa bālo bhuṁjeya bhojanaṁ |
san-lo-mvu109:34: na so sampannaśīlānāṁ kalām arghati ṣoḍaśīṁ ||
san-lo-mvu109:35: māse māse kuśāgreṇa bālo bhuṁjeya bhojanaṁ |
san-lo-mvu109:36: na so svākhyātadharmāṇāṁ kalām arghati ṣoḍaśīṁ ||
san-lo-mvu109:37: yo ca varṣaśataṁ jīve agniparicaraṁ caret* |
san-lo-mvu109:39: yo caikaṁ bhāvitātmānaṁ muhūrtam api pūjayet |
san-lo-mvu109:40: sā ekapūjanā śreyo na ca varṣaśataṁ hutaṁ ||
san-lo-mvu109:41: yat kiṁcid iṣṭaṁ ca hutaṁ ca loke
san-lo-mvu109:43: sarvaṁ pi taṁ na caturbhāgam eti
san-lo-mvu109:45: yo ca varṣaśataṁ jīve duḥśīlo asamāhitaḥ |
san-lo-mvu109:47: yo ca varṣaśataṁ jīve kuśido hīnavīryavān* |
san-lo-mvu109:48: ekāhaṁ jīvitaṁ śreyo vīryam āraṁbhato dṛḍhaṁ ||
san-lo-mvu109:49: yo ca varṣaśataṁ jīve apaśyaṁ buddhaśāsanaṁ |
san-lo-mvu109:51: yo ca varṣaśataṁ jīve apaśyaṁ dharmam uttamaṁ |
san-lo-mvu109:52: ekāhaṁ jīvitaṁ śreyo paśyato dharmam uttamaṁ ||
san-lo-mvu109:53: yo ca varṣaśataṁ jīve apaśyaṁ udayavyayaṁ |
san-lo-mvu109:55: yo ca varṣaśataṁ jīve apaśyaṁ acyutaṁ padaṁ |
san-lo-mvu109:56: ekāhaṁ jīvitaṁ śreyo paśyato acyutaṁ padaṁ ||
san-lo-mvu109:57: yo ca varṣaśataṁ jīve apaśyaṁ amṛtaṁ padaṁ |
san-lo-mvu109:58: ekāhaṁ jīvitaṁ śreyaṁ paśyato amṛtaṁ padaṁ ||
san-lo-mvu109:60: te ca dāni bhagavatā balavaśībhāve vinītā sarve ca te parinirvṛtā | teṣāṁ bhagavāṁ śarīrapūjāṁ ca kṛtvā stūpāṁ ca dharmāraṇyāto ajapālasya nyagrodhamāgato ||
